pages.text: Crafting is the process of constructing tools, items, and blocks. $(br2)$(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() can craft by moving items from their inventory to a crafting grid, arranging them according to a recipe. $(br2)A 2×2 crafting grid can be accessed from the inventory and a 3×3 grid can be accessed by using a $(l:useables/crafting_table)$(item)Crafting Table$().
$(br)Items crafted in the 2×2 grid can also be crafted in the 3x3 grid.

The $(item)Recipe Book$() is a mechanic that serves as a catalog of recipes and as a crafting guide. $(br2)It shows every crafting recipe that the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() has had materials for.
